title: Hotels in Katra - A Holy Place
text:
Hotels in Katra - A Holy Place Hotels in Katra - A Holy Place 0 
Katra Continental hotel is set in the foothills of Trikuta slopes and centrally situated on Jammu Road, 2 km from Katra Railway Station, 4 km from Katra Heliport, 50 km from Jammu Airport and 45 km from Jammu Railway Station. IHR.COM gives the best inns in Katra and its administrations and area are Unmatched! It is strolling separation from Katra's Helipad/Taxi Stand/Bus Stand/Shrine Board Office/Yatra Counter. The Hotels in katra is 52 Km from Jammu Railway station & 55 Km from Jammu Airport. Our ventilated rooms are solely intended for your solace stay, every gloats with private shower, cooling, phone, icebox, shading TV, tea creator and Wi-Fi zone. Including with its one of a kind area the Katra Continental is a business classification inn in a class it could call its own. 
Bhawani International Hotel Katra (2 star) 
Bhawani International is midway situated on the bank of pious river Banganga, Yatra Parchi counter, Bus Stand, Taxi stand, Main Market, all is at walking distance. The glorious magnificence of the Hotel is constructed to incorporate stunning perspectives of the slopes and the dusk. Sumptuous rooms and suits, outfitted with every exquisite amenitie have settled on us the favored decision. For your feasting delight we have unadulterated vegan eatery "GAYATRI" serving Indian & Chinese food, where all arrangements are made without onion and garlic. 
Gupta Palace Hotel Katra (1 star) 
Lodging Gupta Palace is strategically placed on Hospital Road, within of minutes of the Bus Stand and the Helipad. A multi-cooking eatery serving pure vegetarian lover Indian and Chinese sustenance and snacks without onion and garlic. The eatery is open round the clock and can pack the nourishment for your trip too. Such a decent affair to stay there and touring from the inn such a pleasant we see heap of mata Vaishno Devi. The administration gave by inn staff is okay. The speediest administration I have encounter over yonder. Rooms are not so rich but rather well-keep up. Nourishments are decent, particularly aloo ke parathe such a great. The Gupta Palace Hotel is situated in the heart of city, katra. All office is accessible inside of the span. The lodging staff is extremely agreeable and minding. Know more by visiting http://www.hotelsinkatra.in or Call to Book Hotels in Katra +91 9711199594, 011 69 4. Rate this Article
